website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best smart thermostat available right now. Pioneered the market and represents the state of the art.
pros: Offers a compelling combination of DIY-friendliness, sophisticated design, easy-to-use features, and automatic energy-saving settings
cons: Pricey, but its high quality will save you money in the long run

customer_reviews.title: Where is the charger?
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a product you expect it to have the things necessary to operate it. Buy a mobile phone..it comes with charger. When all the things necessary are not available you expect the information to made clear. Like 'no batteries include' on lot of products we buy. Nest has decided that it is OK not to include charger in the box and not tell any one. The equipment does not operate without a charger. Actually unlike phones these thermostats need to be connected all the time. Does it come in the box? NO. You have to pay £35. That is pure scam. The charger should be in the box and if it did not it should not cost £35!
customer_reviews.author: Llama Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the marketing - nightmare to install and get working, even for professionals.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommnd this, the videos showing self installation are misleading to the point of being dishonest. I'd advise looking at other systems, most have similar functionality without the install headaches. I used electricians for the install, and it took them most of the day, they told me this is standard, something I've since had confirmed. We had issues during the instal and called Nest support, they blamed the boiler and that was it. Their documentation and support is poor, and in some cases just misleading. If you're determined to have this installed, be aware of the installation cost - it's not a small cost. I don't see the benefits outweighing this any time soon. I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you care about home automation
customer_reviews.text: Google have pulled the plug on the APIs that allow most home automations to communicate with nest, years after I bought it. This is incredibly unfair and I can't really recommend anyone buying a google based home automation product now as there is a reasonably good change google will discontinue it pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Dargan

customer_reviews.title: Best great product let down by poor support
customer_reviews.text: Best great product let down by poor support. If you have good knowledge of home electrical installation an easy job. Unfortunately nest wants you to use 2 step account verification which is fine but if you change your phone number they have no way of resetting the account as you need a code sent to old number. I have had to create a new account and leave an orphaned account enable as you cannot delete an account either without 2 step verification. Such a simple thing to get right yet nest is incapable. Disappointed given price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Western Bloke

customer_reviews.title: Smart and very elegant!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with Google Nest! Super easy to use and very smart thermostat! Within a first week of using it, Nest learned the daily schedule and automatically adjust the temperature now, no need to manually setup (but you can still do this). Very elegant design and great mobile app! If you found this helpful, I would appreciate if you can press the helpful button :-)
customer_reviews.author: Zuzana

customer_reviews.title: Nest Support so bad!
customer_reviews.text: Paid for an electrician to install the device. It never read anything below 22 degrees. I had a thermometer showing it is 15 degrees! Got in touch with nest support. They told me because I bought it from Amazon I should just send it back to them rather than bother them on chat. It is clearly a malfunctioning item but if they brush off giving support so quickly what will they be like when I actually need their help in a years time. Thinking of sending it back and getting Hive instead.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Broken product, Worst support Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The thermostat wont connect to the heat link. First line support was useless. Literally have you tried turning it off and on again? Have you tried pressing Retry? After 15 mins of this useless 1st line support I waited 2 HOURS!!! yes 2 hours, for someone more senior. After which time they cut me off. I tried calling back and someone answered after 20 mins holding.. said nothing, and then cut me off. Disgusting service. Oh, and btw, the device does not even come with a power supply! you buy that separately!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pickup

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 13 months. AVOID!
customer_reviews.text: About 13 months after we purchased this thermostat it started coming up with error H71 and said it couldn't connect to the HeatLink. Resetting it all to factory it will pair up to the HeatLink for a short time. Also now it can't ever find my wifi network (which it could before). I suspect it's radio electronics are shot. It is very poo for such an expensive piece of kit. Lots of other people are reporting this H71 issue and their rating on TrustPilot is currently 1.8 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: Phil JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but be aware!!
customer_reviews.text: Great styled and easy to use product. Important thing to be aware of when ordering, the Nest needs to be locally powered. Which can restrict where you can locate the unit without a local socket nearby. While the transmitter located at the boiler allows you to run a 2 core cable from it to the thermostat for power. Would you really want a cable running up your wall to the thermostat? Also no USB type charger is supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Rayma1

customer_reviews.title: It was a five star product...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, Google bought Nest and has decided to take a massive dump on owners who rely on the IFTTT and/or "Works with Nest" functionality. Because it allows Nest to work with competitors products, they will be killing this functionality. I, for one, won't be buying any further Nest products, which is a shame as I really like this one. But as will no longer work with my other stuff, it's going to become a pretty doorstop.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installation failed
customer_reviews.text: The engineer (Bizzby) fitted the thermostat which did not work and they have refused to send the engineer to fix the problem and instead they asked me to contact Nest support (already done in the first day). When I informed that as per consumer protection act I will complain against their service to Amazon and they reply was: Roxanne (Bizzby) Dec 10, 12:31 GMT Hi Wael, Thanks for getting back to me. Please feel free to let us know of the outcome. Kind regards, Roxanne Bizzby Customer Happiness Team
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Wael Hamarneh

customer_reviews.title: Power cord and plug not in the box
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived without the listed power cord or plug. My heating engineer called Nest, only to be told they don't supply these anymore, but if so then why does the product info list them? Now, because of my current config, I'm told that I have to fork out extra for the stand
customer_reviews.author: TerryP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent once I gaot it working!
customer_reviews.text: Beware! Mine arrived with the UK thermostat but an American connection which I had to get replaced after an hour on the phone to Nest. It is not supplied with and connections and MUST be installed by a qualified electrician. So whilst I saved £40 because it was on offer I have spent that and more in time/phone/inconvenience and an electrician. Once working it's brilliant I foolishly thought it was plug in and go, so partly my fault.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gooch

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy one now, due to loss of Works with Nest integration and privacy concerns with Google
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Nest thermostat for over a year. I found it reasonably straightforward to install as a replacement for an existing wireless thermostat. I also set up some IFTT ("If this then that") as part of the Works with Nest smarthome ecosystem, for example to alert me if the thermostat detected movement, also bought a Nest smoke/gas alarm. I installed the app and Alexa integration. I was very surprised and disappointed to learn that as part of the Google takeover of the product the "Works with Nest" ecosystem and IFTT integration is to be halted. See the article on Ars Technica which also raises privacy concerns over data shared with Google.
customer_reviews.author: ddraig

customer_reviews.title: Good system with minor gremlins
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the old manual timer on my boiler had broken. It does a good job of switching the heating on and off, however it has an annoying habit of 'learning' and pre-empting when it thinks the heating should come on. I've woken up many times at 5am to find the heating cranking out at full power while it decides it will preheat the house for me before I wake up! You can fiddle with the schedule to trick it into not doing this, but it's a real faff. Overall it is a great system, but you have to be prepared to mess around with it to get the results that you want.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T

customer_reviews.title: Controlling the heat settings remotely using smart phone is excellent as is the history
customer_reviews.text: Had it for about eight months now and very impressed. Dropped a star because it discnnects from the home wifi sometimes. Controlling the heat settings remotely using smart phone is excellent as is the history. Like the geo function that shuts it all down when it sees the registered smart phones are away from the property and switches the heating on when it detects a phone returning. I installed it myself and found it fairly easy. If you aren't confident with electrics I'd go for the professional install though. Our house temperature is certainly more accurate now and I recommend this product if you are in the market for a remote thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this device, since installing it not only do no longer have that annoying clicking that my old thermostat had when turning on and off but I also have a warmer home as it seems much more accurate at reading the actual room themps. I also have a much more energy efficient home proven by my last few months worth of energy bills. I love the functionality, the ability to control remotely and its intelligence to learn our habits and adjust accordingly and also know when we are home or away. I fitted it myself and found it much easier than I expected and I may add I've never install and kind of thermostat before.
customer_reviews.author: Talal Alfoadari

customer_reviews.title: Great whilst it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Worked well until it stopped working after 20 months. The expert that fitted it was at a loss to explain its sudden demise. He said most people go back to non-internet thermostats - and now we are one of them. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: N Smith

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Nest thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat does not work. Paid plumber to come install and the damn thing does not come on so unable to test with Heat link. Heat link is in place working fine but thermostat does not come on. Nest sending replacement thermostat 🤦🏽‍♂️ An expensive gadget which does not include a simple stand or usb cable (essential items). They’re unbelievable 😒
customer_reviews.author: Taj

customer_reviews.title: Great product, well made
customer_reviews.text: Well this is my 3rd smart stat, started with a netatmo, that lasted 3 years, then tado that broke in ten months. Decided it was time to go for a best. The build quality is totally different to the others. Much more premium. Was wired up by a spark as I have a more comprehensive mokexed heating system. I did the set up on app and system. One thing to note is that after installation your hot water will probably be on for 2 hours no matter what your settings are, this is due to the legionnaires setting on the nest. Has worked great since installation.
customer_reviews.author: Andy JS

customer_reviews.title: WiFi stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: When it was first installed it worked fantastic, better than I had expected. After three weeks it kept losing connection to the WiFi so I had to keep resetting it, but after a couple more days it gave up all together, and without the WiFi nothing works. I then found out it's a fairly common problem, the WiFi chip is cheap quality and burns out making the whole thing useless. A complete waste of the biggest part of £200, I've since put my cheap wireless thermostat back on which is very reliable and works faultlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Missett

customer_reviews.title: NOT something you can set up yourself. GET A PROFESSIONAL..!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking we could easily set it up. THINK AGAIN. Not only did we have to pay for a stand that cost another £50, but we also had to pay an electrician £80 to set it up. He had to change wiring in our boiler, which was certainly not something we could have done ourselves. It's good now it's in. But a lot of unexpected expense to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: LHS

customer_reviews.title: Bloody Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love my gadgets. Because I have a combi boiler I decided to get an electrician to fix this device which cost £90 but well worth getting a professional doing it rather than resorting to utube. A few hours later it was all set up and absolutely love it located in the Entryway. I also have the Nest app installed onto my Samsung Note 8 and it's a breeze to control. Walking past the nest thermostat in the hallway will automatically come on and you can set it to the weather, digital or analogue clock (amongst other options) which is pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Roberts

customer_reviews.title: No power cable, really??? Shame!
customer_reviews.text: Thermostat received, fast delivery courier, well packed. Thermostat looks lovely but the box is missing the cable and charger, now me having apple devices in my house you can imagine my dissatisfaction when I did not find a micro usb cable and a wall charger to use on this device. All the YouTube videos unboxing show the cable there and the wall plug. Quite disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: TheDoctor

customer_reviews.title: New Nest Learning Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Had this fitted by a professional recommended by Nest after purchasing from Amazon on Prime Day! It cost £85 to fit and took around an hour with the engineer taking a further 20 mins to explain full functionality. Very pleased with it so far as it is so much easier to use and particularly when away from home it goes it to energy save mode switching back on when you return. It works on location from my phone and of course I can override at any time from the really clear and functional app . No negatives to date and I have been using it for just two months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: purchased to make expensive boiler replacement a little more exciting. really easy to set up and using it day to day could not be easier. have it wall mounted and looks really smart. love the smart learning features and a quick switch to eco mode for the past summer was easy. you get a monthly email with a report on how much the heating was on and how many eco green leaves you earn't which i like. Only negative is does not come with a power cable but don't let that put you off as they are really easy to come by. would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: Great Tech for a Thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a second device for my split system heating. Installed myself, I have a basic understanding of electrical electrics but would recommend an electrician for this if your not confident. Thermostat connects to Google home speakers and phone app. Works well with IFTTT as well. Item was bought in Black Friday warehouse sale 'Used - Like New' and was missing a couple of parts which I had with my first thermostat. My first thermostat has kept my house warm and definitely saved me a few pounds in the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product shame about the installation company
customer_reviews.text: Do not whatever buy this item. Sadly it is a great product, but it is let down by the so called Pro-installer Nest recommend. A 30 minute install took four and a half hours then when the weather changes you then find out that the Pro-installer has messed with your system. At present I have a hot water system that at the same time heats the radiators. So much for saving you money! I am currently in an email argument with the company who are trying to charge me £75 + VAT to install a diverter valve.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not working - Secondhand product deliverd
customer_reviews.text: Booked for a quailfied electrician to install the Google Nest Thermostat. Electrician arrived at my property and started to install the Google Nest, after about 20 minutes the electrician informed me that the Google Nest is faulty. Further to that he pointed out that the product looks like its been used before due to strands of cable have been left within the packaging. Not only have I paid £200 for a faulty Google Nest, also had to pay the electrician for his work.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: No USB cable or Charger included in the Box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Nest 3rd Gen in 2017 and it came with everything needed. I have bought another Nest 3rd Gen for a second property but now in 2019 the box does not come with a charger or USB cable! It is impossible to use it without these essential two items. I had a Nest Pro installer come to fit it for me but he couldn’t do it because of these items now missing from the box. Apparently Nest have decided not to include plug or USB cable
customer_reviews.author: Headhacker

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat AND programmer replacement. Not compatible with gravity hot water. Beware the support.
customer_reviews.text: This has changed our home making it always warm without additional bills. No more worrying about what time the heating will come on, if it's cold enough it will take the necessary action. However beware that this thermostat (3rd Gen) does NOT work with gravity fed hot water systems without purchasing additional electrical switchgear. They don't tell you that on their website and the support from Nest (now Google owned) is shockingly bad.
customer_reviews.author: Gadgeteer

customer_reviews.title: Nest is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Well built, feels good quality and looks stylish on the wall. The interface on the dial is simple. Rotate the dial and push in to accept. The app is very simple to use and it integrates with Amazon Alexa very well. We paid for an engineer to install it, best £50 spent. Installed professionally and works great. It learns what you like in terms of heating and predicts your heating requirements. Clever
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: This looks absolutely fantastic and the build quality is really very good, it feels very strong when turning the dial, not cheap plastic (wouldn’t expect so for the price). The far-sight sensor is accurate and you don’t have to jump in front of it for it to detect you. I’m not 100% sure that the temperature being detected is absolutely accurate and have only set timer rather than using the self learning function... need to play with it a bit more but it seems to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Technician’s behaviour inappropriate and unprofessional.
customer_reviews.text: The technician’s behaviour in my house was inappropriate. Talked incessantly about himself. Made multiple judgements about my life and was not pleasant to have around. He did not inspire confidence as he kept giving reasons why it wouldn’t work rather than talking positively about solutions. A very unpleasant and unsatisfactory experience.
customer_reviews.author: Schilv

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product - returned
customer_reviews.text: This is wireless, but needs a wire. Either uses thermostat wires to the boiler, or a usb cable permanently connected to the thermostat. It doesn't have batteries. You cannot replace an existing wireless thermostat unless you cable this. Therefore a misleading claim to be wireless. The Nest help files online are so bad I left several complaints on them. The product didn't come with any meaningful information or documentation. Now have to try and reclaim the £100 wasted installation fees.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Smart home
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have to have the heating system in your fingertips. The learning feature is great as it really makes you aware of your own habits of turning on heating and usage history allows you to see how much you use every day. The Nest support is very helpful in diagnosing any issues one might have. The only downside is that you must buy a Nest stand/holder separately but it doesn't cost more than £15.
customer_reviews.author: MR Usmani

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and an excellent app, although at a premium price
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use in order to set a schedule for the heating. It is also very nice to extend the hot water from the app (rather than climbing to floors to hit the advance button), as we have teenagers in the house so showers at odd hours. Pricey and we have one unit for the g/f heating zone - don’t think I will spring another £200 + installation for the bedroom zone, but worth it for the ground floor with the added flexibility and convenience that brings.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis W.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well with old style combo boiler
customer_reviews.text: Works very well with old style combo boiler, this is the only smart Thermostat that works correctly with older non heat link boilers, using smart learning capability to work out the minimum amount of time required to run the boiler to achieve the target temperature without going over it, using the residual heat remaining in the radiators after the boiler turns off to reach the target temperature, significantly reducing the amount of gas used by the boiler
customer_reviews.author: John R Currie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, shame about google spoiling it.
customer_reviews.text: Does its job well but very unfortunate that Google have removed all its IFTTT support for it meaning far less powerful smart home integration. Sadly this means that whilst Alexa can control it, it’s nothing like as powerful as it would have been if I’d had a pre-google Nest account. It’s clear Google are just keen for us to buy Google Assistant rather than Alexa. Which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: A. P. Barratt

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Had to get it installed as i already have a wireless thermostat. I somehow also had it that this is also wireless.. its not really as it has a usb cable that goes to a socket. So had to purchase one from guy who fitted it. But works fine, only thing is its not detecting when i am actually away from home, so have to do that through nest app. Detects when near home and turns off eco. Might be my phone or something? Apart from that its great
customer_reviews.author: Fin

customer_reviews.title: Simple installation, great control
customer_reviews.text: I self installed this in just a few minutes without problem, the instructions are really clear and easy to follow. Once set up, it gives such great control, and predicts what you're going to do as well. It's made keeping the house warm at the right time to the right degree so much easier and put me in better control of my spend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mcnally

customer_reviews.title: Works with Nest pulled, stay clear of Google/Nest products
customer_reviews.text: I was happy for a while, but since May came to learn that Google is shutting down the Work with Nest API. This means their Nest products will no longer be able to connect through the public API and as a result less useful. Advise is to stay clear from any cloud based system as you are depending on the support of the business whether to shut it down or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jamzi

customer_reviews.title: Great thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Been wanting a smart thermostat for a long time and read may reviews comparing all the different types out there. Nest seems to be a household name in the smart thermostat business so settled on them . Got this professionally installed by a nest approved partner. Interestingly then started having some minor issues (all things I could fix) with the boiler. Overall still very happy with the product and bought on Prime day for bargain price!
customer_reviews.author: RO

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels quality!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels quality! Also does the hot water. Great product so far, when we’re working from home, but we’ll see if it ‘learns’ a suitable schedule in winter when the heating is more critical. Love the fact that I can now remote control it if I forgot before going out. Nest connectivity has occasionally been a problem when remote, but has been more reliable recently.
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easier
customer_reviews.text: Brought 2 of these for my house and had them installed with 2 different zones. Installation was done by my friend but the connecting up the devices to the mobile was simple. Having my water and heating on an app makes it easier as I could control all of it from my phone. I never have a set time when I was at home so it always changed. Also I have google home so could control everything with voice command :)
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Google integration and ability to control from app
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, looks good and feels good! and by golly it does you good. Much more modern and efficient temperature control than the old bi-metallic strip of the old thermostat, it thinks! and even pre-heats your room, for a nice suggly get up in the morning. Is it cost saving? hard to tell yet, but I think so, I will need to take into account initial purchase price and the vagaries of the weather. I'm happy; so it's good for me!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: was so easy to get configured and hooked into my smart systems
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunaetlty, I was lucky enough to have one of the boilers you can't self install - but after getting it hooked up, was so easy to get configured and hooked into my smart systems. This is easy to use and responsive. Screen wakes up correctly and I've yet to have it woken up by a "ghost". I'm still not sure if I trust it's internal thermometer, but I've integrated it with SmartThings and sensors all round the house, so they tell it when to come off and on. If does give interesting stats and estimates as to when it thinks it'll reach the temperature, which is good. Def helps manage energy a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Holdsworth

customer_reviews.title: Faulty product without customer support.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this piece of junk. Thermostat for almost £200 that can't even read corect temperature. Google forums are full of posts about issues with temperature reads that goes back to over a year, yet no action been taken. Manufacturing and selling products is one thing, but complete lack of customer service is an absurd in 2020. Thank you Google.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought I'd call a techy gadget life changing, however, the nest totally is. Had a horrid thermostat before which takes ages to heat up and also takes two brains to work out how to set it up if you're lucky. This seriously has changed my world, so easy to control and set up once the app is downloaded. LOVE, LOVE my nest!!! Have already recommended to two neighbours to get these changed to the nest!
customer_reviews.author: God's Daughter

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Build Quality & heating Control
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking piece of kit, but more importantly, it will save you money and should pay for its self it six months, I have been monitoring the usage and once the thermostat learns your habits there is very little you need to do to it to save on wastage. It's great if you're out and you want to tweak the heating to be on at a certain temperature for you getting home so that you don't waste very expensive gas, a great purchase I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. Homer

customer_reviews.title: Nest is the best
customer_reviews.text: An excellent purchase at a great price. Installed and I'm learning how to use it just as the Nest is learning what I want from it. Very easy to set up. You can programme it who let it programme things for you. The pre-heat and eco leaf are already saving me money. Why did I not get one sooner. Best thing I've purchased in a long time. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - So far!
customer_reviews.text: Produce owners seem to request a review very quickly after the product has been installed, not really giving you time to fully evaluate the product. It's been less than a week and to date I have found the nest very easy to use and seems to meet my requirements. I haven't had it long enough for it to learn my routine which I have to say isn't much of a routine. That is one of the reasons why I purchased it. The thought of the heating being on when Im not at home is a total waste of money. Now I can adopt to fit into my day.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: Best smart automation you can install
customer_reviews.text: If you have a combi boiler then this is a simple installation but you will need the stand. If you have a standard system boiler with tank and motorised valves then you may need help from a sparky. Versatile so you can introduce it for room stat only or go the full hog and have it control water time control. Using Alexa and via phone is great. The Away feature is a must. When you leave the house the heating goes to setback eco temp. As you can tell I like it....
customer_reviews.author: ASBO

customer_reviews.title: Independent review I love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this have wanted one for ages and bought this for 156 as box damaged it's an absolute bargain I had my boiler services and the gas engineer fitted it for me. It was easy enoygh to set up eve though the set up was in Swedish but I have since swopped it to English. I didn't realise how rubbish my old thermostat was as this is set to 20 and it's cosy the old one was on 30 and still cold. Once it's set up and aiexa is attached it's all done by voice control I'd recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: sarah jones

customer_reviews.title: It's saving me heating oil
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old thermostat and its working well. The only problem was spending hours on plumbing and heating forums to work out what type of heating system I have and how to wire the Nest for it. It turns out I have an open vented central heating system which is not documented in the Nest instructions. But thanks to the internet I found how to wire the Nest thermostat correctly and it is working perfectly. If you are not sure about wiring, get an expert in to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: Nest thermostat
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived ok, but after paying to get it installed I found the outer ring on the thermostat very hard to turn, seems like it has been damaged, unable to return it now as I have paid to have it installed and I’m not going to pay again to get it uninstalled then reinstalled, seems like no one has checked it before delivery. Also there is no stand and cable to power nest thermostat very disappointed as this is NOT a cheap item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works well, saves money!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and my plumber reports that it was very easy to install. I have this connected to my smartphone via an app and I also use Alexa voice commands to control it in the house. We've had it in now for almost a year and our heating bill was slightly lower this year which I believe is due mostly to the clever timers and learning functions of this device. I would not hesitate to recommend it to anyone looking for a smart thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: TubbyNortherner

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 4 month use
customer_reviews.text: This would be a good product if it worked for many years, an excellent one it it worked for a lifetime. But failure after 4 months is not a great feature. Fortunately Nest technical support are excellent and having done all the trouble shooting tests myself and just now repeating them with technical support - they are sending me a replacement within 4 days. A good result but I have lost a little faith in this product. Thank goodness it's not winter.
customer_reviews.author: Rob4Roy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin... almost
customer_reviews.text: It's a Google product, so works better with their software. It's a no-go with ifttt unless your nest account hasn't been migrated. You can't tell it to turn on for 10 mins as a boost, just set the temp. Time will tell how much money it saves by knowing when I'm at home or not... Will be experimenting with Alexa routines to get it working how I want...
customer_reviews.author: Mister T

customer_reviews.title: Works well with my very, very old oil heating boiler
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This makes it much easier to control the central heating. The software within and the app are slick and clever. My Mison Velaire boiler was officially too old for this, however my electrician installed a relay (contactor) between the Nest Heat Link and the boiler switch and another relay between the Nest Heat Link and the immersion heater switch. The old timers were binned. The result is useful full control of both heating and (separate) hot water system from the app. Just to add that we use an immersion heater on night time electricity to heat the water for the morning shower.
customer_reviews.author: RogF

customer_reviews.title: Throw it in the bin
customer_reviews.text: Basically a gimmick. Save your money and buy something that works reliably. Constantly plagued by hot water problems i.e. hot water not coming on. Boiler is perfectly fine and fires up for heating radiators. Just no hot water. If I can offer any advice to someone who is on the fence about buying one of theses then it would be DO NOT BUY. Just uses a non smart device for your heating as it will work. These don't save any money either. Google products suck and I will not be buying them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Took some time to setup
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this nest had it for a few weeks have to say first week we hated it didn’t go well at all the learning thing didn’t learn what we wanted. But now after two I think we have it just fine the app works really says it is a diy job I disagree! But the nest works well it’s sleek Morden and looks good also the screen is bright to! Overall 4.0/5 Make sure to get it on offer to
customer_reviews.author: S. Honnor

customer_reviews.title: Be aware of other accessories purchases if you do not have exiting thermostat wiring.
customer_reviews.text: Fine if you already have a wired thermostat and can reuse the existing cabling. If you do not you will separately need to purchase a USB power cable, a plug adaptor for this cable to connect to the power socket and a stand for the thermostat. Incredibly mean of Google to not at lease provide the power socket and cable or stand, or to make it entirely clear that you need to purchase all of these accessories if you do not currently have wired thermostat cabling.
customer_reviews.author: I. Paterson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice, high-quality product. Very accurate with the temperature reading and management. Easy to integrate with Alexa. I got it on Black Friday and it was well worth the money, but I am not sure I would be buying it if I was paying full price. Took one star off cause they still don't support Cyprus as a location, so I have to have it pretend it is in the UK.
customer_reviews.author: Palio

customer_reviews.title: Starts well but then in the bin
customer_reviews.text: This is great idea and initially worked well BUT after while it started to come off the rails. Heating coming on in middle of night doubled to expense of fuel and despite all the you tube sites it was impossible to tame. Now in the bin and replaced with standard controller that does not rely on WiFi , online support not helpful . All in all waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your smart home
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I think I've purchased for my home. Can manually schedule when heating comes on and off with the timer in the app and everyday can be different times and temperatures. Can turn on the heating when I'm on my way home from work etc so the house is warm. Works great with Alexa too. Lying in bed telling her to turn the heating on to 25 degrees is alot easier than going downstairs! In terms of installation you would need to hire someone which is the only downside but well worth it 10x over when it's up and running.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The dumbest smart product ever
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as hive Not smart Eco just turns off the heat so it’s freezing when you come home No boost function so if you turn the heat on during a cold spell you have to keep stable internet connection to turn it off remotely At the moment cannot get it to turn on water only .Thus may have been due to my so called “expert” installer who couldn’t make this work we are now looking for another “expert” to fix this Disaster
customer_reviews.author: McNinch

customer_reviews.title: Bizzarely no power adapter or cable were included.
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple Nest products and all of them come with both a power adapter and cable. Fortunately I have a large collection of cables and chargers acquired over the years so it wasn't hard to sort it out. Amazon were also great about offering a partial refund. The product itself is top notch as you would expect of Nest.
customer_reviews.author: sectopod

customer_reviews.title: Not so smart
customer_reviews.text: Never again. The learning side of this is that it will just turn on 24hours from when you last manually adjusted it. It does not integrate with the weather so the bloody heat turns on when it's warm and sunny outside. You'd normally have it off in nice weather. No integration with Ifttt so you can't link it with the weather. Don't even get me started with Googles tech support and the copy and paste replies.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer support
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how awful customer support can be from a company like google. My nest broke with a w5 error after 2 months. it's a "very rare" problem of course. 4h in the chat with google and they aren't capable of sending a replacement. Useless. Triping over their own bureacracy. Avoid like the plague.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I do love my new nest thermostat. It is very easy to use and can be controlled by a smart phone. It is motion sensors so when you move about the house it wakes up the display. There are options to display weather or clock rather than have the temperature on show all the time. I would recommend getting a professional in to fit it. It is not as easy as it seems to fit. The nest website has a list of people qualified to fit.
customer_reviews.author: nikki lemon

customer_reviews.title: Really works but hire a pro for install
customer_reviews.text: Wife hasn’t complained once about being cold since we got this, hence worth five stars! so simple and after a while it learnt when we wake up and has the house warm already. Expensive and costly to get installed by a professional, which having seen done I would not recommend you do yourself unless you are competent with central heating systems and wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Dougie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant replacement for my old 1970s manual heating/hot water timer
customer_reviews.text: My 21st century Nest thermostat is now working perfectly with my 40 year old Potterton gas boiler powered heating and hot water ( thanks to the expert fitting service I bought along with it). And, thanks to Nest, I can tell from my smart meter that I've already started saving a load of energy, reduced household carbon dioxide emissions and started saving money too!
customer_reviews.author: B. Hockley

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, made to a high level and you can feel the quality as you handle it. Once you use it you will never want to go back to your old setup. Can control it via the phone app, website and connects easily to a Google Home. Easy, clean and simple interface that anyone could use. I Please be aware it will cost around £100 pounds to get it installed by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: ZH

customer_reviews.title: Really nice idea.
customer_reviews.text: Makes life so much easier. Especially in the winter being able to operate it instantly via your phone is super helpful. Only negative is that it tries to predict your habits - for example when I get it it puts is straight on to 22oC. There is an option to switch this off which made no difference hence the 3 stars. It is now a nuisance to keep turning it down every time I come in and its not that cold outside.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie

customer_reviews.title: User friendly and no need for plumbers or electricians
customer_reviews.text: Although took a bit of fiddling to set up, I found that even without any previous plumbing or electronic knowledge I was able to install this myself. I’d recommend YouTube tutorials to help with your current setup but once I got it working, found Nest to be really good. Wasn’t sure whether to choose this or hive but actually I’m glad I went for Nest. Very user friendly and good support available. Looks neat on my wall and everything I needed for set up came in the box. Went on holiday recently and loved how easy it was to turn everything off remotely at a click of a button on the app. Really pleased overall.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H

customer_reviews.title: essential smart home product
customer_reviews.text: product is well built and feels expensive - warning recommend professional installation unless you understand boilers and electrical items. works well at our house when away it turns to eco mode which will keep boiler off unless the house drops below a certain number. easy to program and offers tons of options to configure your house the way you want it to be
customer_reviews.author: thomas rosser

customer_reviews.title: Do it, it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I live with two females, one is a South African human. The other is a Maine Coon (Big furry cat from Canada). This posses a problem and clouds can form at doors and windows due to the temperature difference. Nest is controlling the temperature so accurately that there are no more spikes of heat and then freezing again due to delay possible dying old thermostat. Both of the ladies in my life are now happy and I can wear clothes indoors again. Be prepared to need a professional for install. And hopefully I will save as much as a friend of mine did in one year of having it - £300. It’ll pay for its self!
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Good product. No power cable though.
customer_reviews.text: Nest is excellent. My only gripe is that they don't provide a power cable.... You need to get one (eg with the Stand), unless you are "hardwiring" your Nest into a wall, in which case you don't need a power cable.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: This device has made my daily life so much easier. Prior to fitting this, I had to physically switch my heating on and off via a switch in my bedroom. Now I can control my heating via my phone or by twiddling with the Nest itself. I'm very hopeful that the Nest will be the icing on my energy saving cake. It's also a great looking device.
customer_reviews.author: Sonicscot

customer_reviews.title: Nest Learning Thermostat, 3rd Gen.
customer_reviews.text: Very clear documentation to understand the install. Simple and pain free installation (for peace of mind with a Nest recommended electrician). Easy and Simple. You need to think about where it should be located and, if you want a minimalist, "clean wall" look, you will need power outlet at that point feeding in behind thermostat location. Otherwise you can use the cradle, which looks elegant. Has been effortless to use since installation, both directly and via phone/web browser. You can set a schedule in the traditional way - or take a leap of faith and allow the thermostat to "learn" your routines and optimise heating efficiency and economy - this appears to work well.
customer_reviews.author: David Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece of practical kit...
customer_reviews.text: My old thermostat kept dropping the connection to the box on the boiler (RF, old school battery thermostat). Thermostat was in the hallway, boiler and recover in the garage next door. No such issues with connectivity with the Nest, immensely more attractive and so easy to use. Can’t comment on Alexa connectivity (don’t have Alexa) not installation (had a professional do the work).
customer_reviews.author: Mr MindwarpZ

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to heatlink, out of pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Qualified electrician spent a while trying to install and connect over existing wireless thermostat and multiple times the heat link would not connect to the thermostat. Tried resetting the link and moving both around the space to try and connect but still won’t connect at all, H71 error link every time. Really unhappy as I still had to pay for his time but do not have a working thermostat, which cost a lot in the first place. Tech support are speaking to me but trying to get me to remotely fix when I’m not an expert. Just want a new unit sent so he can come back and fit, which I’ll also have to shell some more cash to cover.
customer_reviews.author: Tom G

customer_reviews.title: Great device. Some people have complained that the functionality ...
customer_reviews.text: Great device. Some people have complained that the functionality is flawed in that if you're out for a few hours, it picks up you're out and lowers the temp and it takes so long to up the temp when it knows you've returned. I get that, however, I just up the eco (lowest) temperature so the difference is less when its cold. I then change the eco temp when I'm away so the house isn't being blasted. I still think its great, especially when you've been on holiday and come home to a warm house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money...
customer_reviews.text: A gret buy as it is a modern technology, can be seen digitally your home temperature, it turns the lights (display) on as soon you walk in the house, it smartly understands scheduled arrival and leaving times. Can be tuned on/off remotely away from home. Is just a great device to have. Definitely will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kamlesh Guiga

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: It's really handy to be able to turn the heat on and off from a work, on the way home and even from the airport and abroad. During the icy weather I was concerned about the low temperatures and using the app I was able to turn the heat on for an hour whenever I needed to when in Spain. I couldn't do without it now! It's also great that you get an email every month showing your usage and how you compare against others in your area. I have been told that this doesn't work well with gas on Valliant boilers so might be best to check it out first before buying!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah K Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and Smart!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I got 2 to cover the 2 heating zones. Learns and updates schedule itself, efficient use of heating and easy to control. Extremely transparent as to how much time it’s been on and at what temp. Links with Alexa well plus app is easy to use and responsive. A great addition to a smart home and a good step before getting NEST fire alarms.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Godley

customer_reviews.title: Went from an old timer only thermostat with no tempreature ...
customer_reviews.text: Went from an old timer only thermostat with no tempreature sensor to this. House is now a more consistant tempreature overall AND saves me money as it's no longer got the boiler on maximum all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant thermostat, disappointing HW control
customer_reviews.text: Classy bit of kit, the dial and display look and feel really high quality. The heating control is excellent, after just a few weeks it's auto-scheduled such that I never have to touch it and it's using the boiler a lot less than before. Only let down is the hot water control which is simplistic and can only be manually scheduled to a granularity of 30 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Woburn

customer_reviews.title: Even my husband can use it!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Nest 3rdGen is so easy to use. Our old wireless thermostat had gone haywire, but I had always hated it. It was too complicated and had a tiny display. I literally needed a magnifying glass to make adjustments. In contrast the Nest is very clear and very simple. It lends itself to adjustments up or down whenever the need arises rather than making do. I love the fact that I can turn the temperature down when I am out or if I am away longer than anticipated. No more wasting heat in an empty house. It will give me the confidence to leave the house for a winter break as I will know how the house is faring.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Once installed easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and it's brilliant. Makes a big difference to be able to turn the heating on/turn it up so the house is warm when i get home. The phone app is very easy to use. You can set your daily schedule as per the older systems but now i can quickly adjust settings with a few taps on my phone. I needed an electrician friend to connect it up to my boiler system, didn't take long but not a job i could've tackled myself. All in all very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. It is a scam
customer_reviews.text: WHERE IS THE CHARGER? Charger not included in the product. This is not clear on the ad. Count 35 pounds on top for the charger! You need to think twice before you buy this and have low hopes for fitting this on the wall. The electricians refused to do this due to its complication with old wiring. I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Weizen koenig

customer_reviews.title: 2nd unit failed
customer_reviews.text: The nest device has an inherent fault with the wifi chip which burns out meaning that it only works as a glorified manual controller and when the wifi chip has burnt out you cannot access over your phone etc. I have two and both have failed. Search the internet to confirm that this is a problem. Google are not doing anything about it as far as I can tell. If you have a similar problem make sure you mention this to the support person otherwise they will waste your time getting you to check all sorts of irrelevant things.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time
customer_reviews.text: Really fed up with this product. Have had to send it back twice and have identified now three different faults. First off it wouldn’t connect to heating. 2nd version decided it could no longer find an internet connection and whilst awaiting a 2nd replacement its now heating my house like a sauna and will not switch off. Ive had to disconnect the boiler altogether. Such a waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't control temp
customer_reviews.text: Room temperature set at 20 degrees but device hasn't stopped the actual temperature rsing 20 23 gress and still rising Tech support wanted a photo. I said I didnt see what good that owuld do. they were supposed to email me the address to send it to but din't NOT HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeh

customer_reviews.title: Additional items needed
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking product and does as it should but it can only be connected to the wall if it is going in the place of an old wired thermostat. I ended up having to buy a stand and power supply which was an additional cost. A bit disappointed that these were not included in the box considering the price. I expect that from a company like Apple and am surprised Google are following that path as I've always been happy with their products.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beer

customer_reviews.title: Great item - wonderful to use once setup
customer_reviews.text: The second time I've installed one of these and they're amazing. Highly recommended. Easy to set up and to use. The learning feature is a weird one, but once you've set on/off times, it's a fantastic tool. I would NEVER install a normal thermostat from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on the wall and really works well with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Installation was not as simple as i thought, bare in mind the £169 option does not come with free installation and i was quoted £100 for a Nest Pro certified electrician to install it, luckily i have a friend who is a plumber and electrician and he installed it in 30mins and it was his first one. Looks great on the wall and really works well with the rest of our smart home devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jack H

customer_reviews.title: Back of the nest!! Hav-it!!
customer_reviews.text: A great product for convenience and design. It was very easy to swap out the old and somewhat buggy 1st generation Nest. Quick 15 minutes to switch out the old heat link and thermostat. The heat link box was a little bigger than the 1st generation one but that only meant a need screw plug but the thermostat fixed securely into the old screw plugs without any hassle. Always worth taking a photo of the old wiring if you’re confident, competent and upgrading.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: High hopes, larger disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm pretty disappointed. My hot water was instant but since installing nest I can now only get hot water when my heating is on. I've tried finding trouble shooting solutions with no success. Also, my nest device keeps losing connection with the heat link (h71), and despite following all the troubleshooting steps, I have not been able to resolve this. I just have to wait a day or so until it feels like reconnecting again (this happens regularly). It's becoming more and more frustrating and is almost to the point where I may as well go back to not having a thermostat.
customer_reviews.author: miss k crosby

product_meta.title: Google Nest Learning Thermostat, 3rd Generation, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:SilverThe 3rd-generation Nest learning thermostat is slim, sleek and beautiful. With a big, sharp display and Farsight, you can see the temperature, time or weather from across the room. The Nest thermostat learns the temperature you like, then programs itself. It knows how long it takes to heat your home so that you are comfortable when you get there. When you leave, it turns itself down so that you save energy. And with the Nest app you can change the temperature or check your energy history from anywhere.

BOX CONTAINS
Display
Base
Heat Link
Optional trim plate
Mounting screws
Installation guide and warranty
Welcome Guide
feature_bullets: Connected programmable thermostat that lets you control your heating more efficiently. You can control up to 20 thermostats per home
Change the temperature and more from your smartphone (iOS and Android)
Smart programming to help you save energy. The Nest thermostat smartly adjusts itself to your preferred temperatures, your home’s insulation and the weather outside
Uses your phone’s location and built-in activity sensors to automatically avoid heating an empty home
Compatible with almost all individual heating systems (gas boilers, oil boilers, condensing boilers, heat pumps, underfloor heating, OpenTherm systems)
Install it yourself or with the help of a Nest Pro installer (installation sold separately)
